DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , single-dose study evaluate pharmacokinetics intravenous Ascorbic Acid .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetics Study Intravenous Ascorbic Acid
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study : 1 . To evaluate single-dose pharmacokinetics AA administer intravenously ( IV ) . 2 . To evaluate safety tolerability AA administer intravenously .
DOC.criteria: Is age 18 45 year , inclusive . Has body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 . Of sound health ability understand requirement study willing comply study requirement procedure . Participates activity would allow accurate evaluation pharmacokinetics Ascorbic Acid Medical physical condition would allow safe participation and/or accurate evaluation pharmacokinetics Ascorbic Acid Has participate investigational drug study within 30 day prior CRU admission .
